RecycleNow — a smart recycling initiative that allows customers to return plastic covers and packaging at nearby grocery stores for responsible recycling.

How it works:

  • 🛒 Drop & Earn: Customers bring used plastic covers to partner stores (e.g., Walmart) and scan a QR code to record the drop.

  • ♻️ Smart Tracking: The system logs the weight or count of plastic returned and updates user rewards.

  • 💬 Community Awareness: Mobile notifications and gamified leaderboards encourage regular recycling.

  • 📊 Impact Dashboard: Displays how much plastic each store or community has diverted from landfills.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Plastic bags and packaging materials are used daily but rarely recycled properly. Most end up in landfills or oceans, causing long-term pollution. While grocery stores like Walmart or Target have recycling bins, many customers don’t know about or use them consistently.

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Service Catalog: Users schedule drop-offs or view nearby collection points.

  • Flow Designer + IntegrationHub: Automates QR code tracking and connects to store systems.

  • Performance Analytics: Tracks recycling metrics and sustainability progress.

  • Mobile App / Portal: Provides location maps, digital rewards, and community leaderboards.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Technical Dependencies

ServiceNow (core)

  • Employee Center / Public Portal (UI Builder) for store locator, QR scan, rewards wallet

  • Service Catalog + Flow Designer/Subflows for drop submissions and automation

  • IntegrationHub (REST, webhooks) for retailer/recycler/logistics integrations

  • Field Service Management (FSM) for pickup work orders, routing, proof-of-service

  • Customer/Partner Service Management (CSM) for onboarding retailers/recyclers, SLAs

  • Performance Analytics for KPIs (kg diverted, contamination %, rewards issued)

  • Sustainability/ESG Management (optional) for CO₂e and diversion reporting

  • Now Mobile for QR/Barcode scan, push notifications, badges
